full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: E60HP-24CARG-A

## Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: WS4417344327
* Reference Number: WS4417344327-Doc4476792983
* Publication Date: 2024-04-10
* Tender Closing Date: 2029-03-31T14:00:00

## Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence invites bidders to submit offers for a supply arrangement to provide various configurations of light-duty cargo trailers. This procurement aims to establish a long-term supply arrangement that meets the requirements of the Department of National Defence.

## Key Procurement Details

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and many more.
* UNSPSC Code: 25181700 (Product and Material Trailers)
* Regional Deliveries: Canada
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Contact Information

To learn more about this opportunity, please contact:

* Valerie Matheson (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [valerie.matheson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:valerie.matheson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not Available

## Additional Information

* The procurement encourages bidders to submit an Indigenous Participation Plan (IPP) as part of their offer.
* Bidders should consult the solicitation document for detailed information on the IPP criteria and evaluation process.

[Click here to view the full solicitation document](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19364800?extsite=MTkzNjQ4MDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Let me know if the rewritten version fits the format and requirements you specified. Please ask if you need any further modifications!  I used an OCCASIONALLY indented style only to indicate important details like key procurement details.

I can also delete it if you wish. Willing enough to rewrite and rephrase if there are errors throughout. Willing enough to make changes quickly. Available too to translate it to french if you wish. 

Waited for your feedback! Available to answer your comments and your thoughts of mine answer. I enjoyed rephrasing so much.
